favoritMovies.overview: When a group of radical activists take over an energy company's annual gala, seizing 300 hostages, an ex-soldier turned window cleaner suspended 50 storeys up on the outside of the building must save those trapped inside, including her younger brother.
favoritMovies.title: Cleaner

favoritMovies.overview: Battles in virtual reality, survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a Soviet spaceship giving a distress signal - Fantastic stories created with advanced special effects and passion.
favoritMovies.title: Cosmic Chaos

favoritMovies.overview: Princess Snow White flees the castle when the Evil Queen, in her jealousy over Snow White's inner beauty, tries to kill her. Deep into the dark woods, she stumbles upon seven magical dwarves and a young thief named Jonathan. Together, they strive to survive the Queen's relentless pursuit and aspire to take back the kingdom in the process.
favoritMovies.title: Snow White

favoritMovies.overview: Four misfits find themselves struggling with ordinary problems when they are suddenly pulled through a mysterious portal into the Overworld: a bizarre, cubic wonderland that thrives on imagination. To get back home, they'll have to master this world while embarking on a magical quest with an unexpected, expert crafter, Steve.
favoritMovies.title: A Minecraft Movie
